    When executed, this exchangeable item will be removed from player's inventory and the new item or new weapon item will be added into player's inventory
    String
    PickUpRunesAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When executed, the dropped runes amount will be added into the player's runes amount.
    String
    PurchaseAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When executed, this purchasable item will be added into player's inventory and corresponding runes amount will be deducted from player's runes amount.
    String
    ResetAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When executed, all the enemies and items that are resettable will be reset.
    String
    RestAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When executed, the player's runes will be added capability of RESTING before resetting the game.
    String
    SellAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When executed, this sellable item will be removed from player's inventory and corresponding runes amount will be added to player's runes amount.
    String
    SummonAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When execute, a summonable actor will choose by chance and find a surrounding spot to be summoned If there's a spot to summon the actor, summon the actor; else do nothing
    String
    TravelAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When execute, the actor will be removed from the current map and added to the amp that the actor want to reach

    HarmlessEnemy

    class 
    PileOfBones
    A Harmless Enemy called Pile Of Bones, who will not attack any other actors in the game, and is formed due to the death of Heavy Skeletal Swordsman and Skeletal Bandit.
